text: Abdul Salam, known by his stage name Geetha Salam, (9 October 1946 â€“ 19 December 2018) was an Indian actor. He was known for his Malayalam movies Malabar Wedding, Jalolsavam (2004) and John Paul Vaathil Thurakkunnu (2014). He performed in about 82 movies and some TV shows. He was born in Oachira, Kerala, India. Salam died on 19 December 2018 at the age of 72.Malayalam actor Geetha Salam passes away at 73 == References == == Other websites == * Category:1946 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian stage actors Category:Actors from Kerala
title: Geetha Salam
